{"inkVersion":21,"root":[[{"->":"intro"},["done",{"#f":5,"#n":"g-0"}],null],"done",{"intro":["ev","str","^annoying","/str",{"x()":"on_team","exArgs":1},"/ev",[{"->":".^.b","c":true},{"b":["
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^And what are you supposed to be?","
","^...","
","^Oh, I guess they don't talk.","
","^Ookay guy.","
","^...","
","^Just trying to start a friendly conversation.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str",{"x()":"on_team","exArgs":1},"/ev",[{"->":".^.b","c":true},{"b":["
","^For the love of, just start the fight already!","
",{"->":".^.^.^.26"},null]}],"nop","
",{"->":"intro.8"},null]}],[{"->":".^.b"},{"b":["
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh, I know these guys.","
","^...","
","^They are bad.","
","^...","
","^Sorry, we will have to fight through them if we want to get anywhere.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str",{"x()":"on_team","exArgs":1},"/ev",[{"->":".^.b","c":true},{"b":["
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^As you command!","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Jesus, are you in love with me or something?","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^What?","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I mean, you keep saying things like that, it's just...","
","^It's weird.","
","^Like you are obsessed with me or something.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I'm not!","
","^You know, I have a wife!","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^...","
","^You have a wife?","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^No, that was a lie.","
","^It's just that...","
","^Well...","
","^...","
","^Okay, I'm starting to realize that I am in fact sounding, like I am in love.","
","^But just for your knowladge.","
","^I'm not.","
","^I think.","
","^I mean, I'm not.","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Just stop speaking.","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^It's just that...","
","^...","
","^I now understand your point of view-","
","^and the situation in general-","
","^and all I want to say is...","
","^Noted.","
","^I'll... keep that in mind in the future.","
","^I apologize, if my actions made you uncomfortable.","
","^It won't happen again.","
",{"->":".^.^.^.24"},null]}],"nop","
",{"->":"intro.8"},null]}],"nop","
","end",{"#f":1}],"global decl":["ev","str","^annoying","/str",{"VAR=":"speaker"},"/ev","end",null],"#f":1}],"listDefs":{}}
